title: Farming of Cervid Livestock: A Look into Management of the Animal and its Waste

tasks.task: What physical tasks are involved in managing cervid livestock and their manure?
subtasks: Consider the layout and size of a cervid farm (small concentrations, males, females, and offspring).
Differentiate between extensive and intensive management practices for red deer, elk, and whitetail deer.
Understand the role of forage in diet composition and digestibility.
Calculate crude protein and nitrogen excretion in manure based on feeding practices.
Compare consumption rates and manure output between red deer, elk, and whitetail deer.
Analyze the impact of diet digestibility on manure nutrient content and management.
